Topic.Title: (Beginner) How do I change something based on the player's score?

Posts.HTML:
I'm currently using

if (game.score>50) {
msg ("You are feeling stronger")
}

but it doesn't seem to work, since when I get the score over 50 nothing happens

Posts.EditableText: That looks valid. Are you sure that code is being reached? Where are you putting it?
